|brand = Nortel |model = NetWave AirSurfer |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Pro (1100-600) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = DSSS |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NALASPRO |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->

|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = legacy (DSSS) |wififreq = <!-- 2.4 or 5, 60 --> |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/14/1998 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Ireland

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[Nortel NetWave AirSurfer Pro]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/NALASPRO NALASPRO] (MODEL 1100-600) :''[[Nortel]] Networks NETWAVE AIRSURFER PRO WLAN PC CARD'' :There is a ''[[Harris]]'' HFA3726IN on-board.
;{{See also|Nortel WLAN Access Point 2330}} :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RVW2330 RVW2330] (''Nortel Networks, Inc.'')
